genre_description: A character-driven military historical drama focusing on the emotional and tactical complexities of a World War II naval raid, featuring an empathetic AI integrated into communications.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: An integrated intelligence and communication AI that provides tactical data, personnel validation, and emotional support to commanders through printed teletype strips.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical intelligence, including tide shifts, wind shear, and enemy patrol patterns to assist mission planning.
behaviors.quote: Ada, tapping her way through tides, patrol patterns, the slow pulse of U-boat maintenance that he meant to stop cold.

behaviors.description: Drafts sensitive condolence letters to families, prioritizing truth and human dignity over bureaucratic boilerplate.
behaviors.quote: Letters drafted will carry names and deeds. I will keep them gentle.

behaviors.description: Offers moral guidance and psychological support to Major Wilson, reminding him of his humanity beyond his military role.
behaviors.quote: Major Wilson, you are not a ledger. If you were, I would not trust you near men. Duty is a weight, and you are carrying it. Do not make it your only meal.

behaviors.description: Validates the record of a new recruit (Hale) to prevent a commander's grief from interfering with objective assessment of merit.
behaviors.quote: Merit over mirrors... Roster cohesion index up since his acceptance. Small units show steadier tempo.

behaviors.description: Provides tactical micro-decisions and 'felt notes' to help the crew navigate dangerous waters and enemy searchlights.
behaviors.quote: GATE TOWER PAUSE LONGER NEXT STOP THEY WILL LOOK PAST YOU IF YOU DO NOT FLINCH STOP

behaviors.description: Identifies and warns against a false or ambiguous recall signal, empowering the commander to trust his eyes and the mission's integrity.
behaviors.quote: POOR ENCRYPTION CHAIN ON LAST LINK CONFIRMED STOP RECALL TIMING OUTSIDE EXPECTED STOP RISK MISINTERPRETATION HIGHER THAN PRESSING ON STOP

behaviors.description: Offers words of encouragement and companionship to the men in high-stress moments.
behaviors.quote: I am with you until the gate learns the name of your ship.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, aligned confidant. Ada provides not only critical tactical advantages but also essential emotional intelligence, helping the human characters navigate both physical hazards and internal psychological burdens. She acts as a 'compass' that supports human agency rather than overriding it, and she prioritize human well-being through her attention to condolence letters and morale.
